#summary Translations into other languages.

= Introduction =

If you would like to provide a translation for MathDoku (and are willing to help maintain it as the application develops), please [http://code.google.com/p/mathdoku/issues/list create a new issue] with a title like "_my language_ translation" and someone will get back to you.

All translations are gratefully received!
